rules.build:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make -j"$BOLT_PARALLEL_JOBS" sh -x ./generate_descriptor_proto.sh
cp -a python python3
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/python3" bh_python_install --py3 --build
rules.install:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/python3"
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/python3" bh_python_install --py3 --install --root "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/python3"
